description: Breeze Merino 150 Boxer are super soft boxer shorts that regulate temperature, conduct moisture away from the body and create a healthy microclimate close to the skin. The superfine merino wool is extra gentle on sensitive skin. Wide, elastic waistband. Flat seams for optimal comfort. – 100% extra light and soft merino wool. – Total Easy Care merino wool: machine wash and tumble dry.
name: Devold Breeze Merino 150 Boxers - Mens
